author: Xbox
description:
Each year, the Paintress inscribes the cursed number on her monolith — and each year, an expedition sets out to end her reign. None have ever returned, but they have laid the trail for those who come after. Sixty-seven years after their world shattered in the Fracture, Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 follows the idealists still daring to dream of a future for Lumière. 

In this trailer — narrated by Jennifer English (voice of Maelle in the English version) — step into Maelle’s world on the eve of her departure with Expedition 33. One last chance to destroy the Paintress, so that she may never paint death again.

Expedition 33 will release on April 24 2025 on Xbox Series X|S, day one with Game Pass. Pre-order now!

https://www.xbox.com/games/expedition-33

author: Xbox
description:
In Deliver At All Costs, every delivery matters - even if things get a little messy… 

This new trailer showcases the game's unique approach to physics-based destruction. Whether it's crashing through fences, skidding across rooftops, or toppling the town’s prized landmarks, Winston will do whatever it takes to get the job done! 

Deliver At All Costs brings the destruction to Xbox Series X|S on May 22nd! 

Pre-order: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/deliver-at-all-costs/9pmwkz7ftnp0

author: Xbox
description:
The Oldest House is teeming with dangerous paranatural hazards, like a Furnace spewing fire across the Maintenance Sector or pink Exogenic Mass that explodes if you touch it. It’s up to you, as a Firebreaker, to face these hazards with your friends, contain them, and get out in one piece.

FBC: Firebreak is a 3-player cooperative first-person shooter set within the enigmatic Federal Bureau of Control (FBC). As the Bureau’s headquarters faces a deadly and prolonged siege by otherworldly forces, only Firebreak—its most adaptable response unit—has the skills and courage to restore order. 

FBC: Firebreak is scheduled to release in Summer 2025 for PC and Xbox Series X|S. Wishlist now!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/fbc-firebreak/9pdcn8z4hkrn

author: Xbox
description:
Tempopo, the new game from the creators of Unpacking, is out NOW! Play day one on Xbox Game Pass. 

60 base puzzle levels, another 60 challenge levels, a melody synthesizer garden that allows you to create your own musical masterpieces, and the most adorable puzzle helpers you've ever seen.
